title: BNP Paribas launches operations in GIFT city
description: BNP Paribas, Europe's top bank, commenced operations at Gujarat's International Finance Tec-City (GIFT-IFSC). Aimed at offering comprehensive products and strategic solutions to clients, CEO Sanjay Singh highlighted its importance for BNP Paribas India franchise and India's USD 5 trillion economy goal. They are delighted to participate in this growing financial center.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
